headline: Garlic-Herb Linguine
name: Garlic-Herb Linguine
description: This linguine pasta recipe features tender linguine tossed with melted butter, garlic, parsley, and seasoned salt. Pair it with any main dish!
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes. Drain and transfer to a large bowl.
Mix melted butter, garlic, and parsley together in a small bowl. Drizzle butter mixture over linguine. Add seasoned salt and toss to coat.
